intro: Aneilema micranthum, commonly known as the small-flowered aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant features opposite, simple leaves that are usually elliptical or ovate in shape. Its small, white or pale pink flowers are clustered in cymes, and it produces small, spherical berries. Aneilema micranthum is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forest understories.
